discussion.content: Bcd should be the correct answer

I think this question is not really relating to the case itself but what CAN be done with security roles. Answer A and D cannot be done since there is no Business Rule permission and there are no permissions on form level. A security role can only be assigned to a form, giving users access. It's yes or no/black or white on form level, there are no permission levels. So therefor the answer must be BCE

The reason B and E are correct is because it says that: "Wardens should be able to see only the information their guards put into the system." So they aren't supposed to have organization permissions or user permissions to all records, only their own guards.

D is correct because it says that: "Inmates report seeing different registration forms." That would indicate that there is a permissions problem on the forms.

Final answer is ABD. It is not BR it is BU and BU level access for all inmates will break the security for Class access, it has to be done through 2/3 Teams with local access. There is no problem if C or E holds true.

ABD
Assuming that there is a type error on A ("Business Rule" instead of "Business Unit") and that C and E are not correct

BCD

Major inmates can attend only online classes. 
So this may be a problem if they have organization permisison they can attend all classes

For me the given answer is correct.
Federal inmates can enroll for all classes, so viewing all by classes by them is not an issue.
Major inmates can enroll for only online class so his ability to view organizational data can be a problem.

questions.question_text:
An audit reveals that security roles were not set up correctly.
Which three issues may occur? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.A: All inmate types will have Business Rule permissions on the class's entity.
choices.D: Major inmates will have organizational permissions on registration forms.
choices.C: Federal inmates will have organizational permissions on all classes.
choices.B: Wardens will have organizational permissions to all records.
choices.E: Wardens will have user permissions to all records.
